entry.title: FREEZING DRIZZLE ADVISORY , Stratford
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:59 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Freezing Fog, -0.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: London Int'l Airport 4:54 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
Condition: Freezing Fog
Temperature: -0.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.4 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -0.6°C
Wind: S 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. Risk of freezing drizzle early this evening. Risk of snow squalls before morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 20 km/h increasing to 40 gusting to 70 early this evening then becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Local blowing snow in the morning and early in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 in the morning. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 16. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: A few flurries. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning before morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Thursday 23 February 2023
